sentences.english: I'm using exactly the same form to reduce this.
sentences.chinese: 我用的同樣的方法來減少問題的規模。

sentences.english: The Nokia 1209 also has a one-piece key mat for durability and reliability.
sentences.chinese: 諾基亞1209也同樣是一款耐用和可靠的好機型。

sentences.english: I am tired of hunting the same old coon.
sentences.chinese: 反覆幹同樣的事，我真幹膩了。

sentences.english: Note that the standard requires an empty line after the headers too.
sentences.chinese: 注意該標準同樣要求在域頭之後要有個空行。

sentences.english: We think it’s possible that your company is at risk in this area as well.
sentences.chinese: 因而我們認爲貴司在這個領域也可能面臨同樣的風險。

sentences.english: "And also this affair must be discreet, " Kugelmass continued.
sentences.chinese: “然後同樣這次外遇必須保密，”庫馬思繼續。

sentences.english: The Taliban also banned, wouldn’t you know it, the keeping of songbirds.
sentences.chinese: 你不難猜出，塔利班同樣禁止了留養金絲雀。

sentences.english: Again, I'm not opposed to long-term deficit reduction, so long as it's equitable.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，我不反對長期削減赤字，只要它的公平。

sentences.english: We educate with silence as well.
sentences.chinese: 安靜同樣可以進行教育。

sentences.english: "Piano lessons, " I tell Kevin. "Same as last year. "
sentences.chinese: “學鋼琴”，我報告凱文，“和客歲同樣”。

sentences.english: Many of our picks also share Tinley Park's family-friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 很多我們的推薦也同樣有家庭友好的氣氛。

sentences.english: Again, this is good news but let us put it in perspective.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，這也是個好消息，但讓我們正確看待它。

sentences.english: A broader set of primitives, but nonetheless the same fundamental thing holds.
sentences.chinese: 一些廣闊的基本類型，但還是同樣的基本東西。

sentences.english: Users of popular Twitter-like microblogging service Sina Weibo were likewise disbelieving.
sentences.chinese: 新浪微博的用戶也同樣不相信這個裁定結果。

sentences.english: And Pierre began to have the same feeling towards Karataev.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾也開始對卡拉塔耶夫抱着同樣的感情。

sentences.english: In the same way, the Lord took the time and effort to stitch you together.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的，上帝也是一針一線把你縫紉起來。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
